dict.acceptation: 十年，十年间；十个一组；十年期；

sent.orig: For a decade or so Japan's lost decade has been the great bugaboo of modern macroeconomics.
sent.trans: 日本在这大概十年间的失败已经成为当今宏观经济学家吓人用的鬼怪。

sent.orig: Therefore, this is a decade of great importancea crucial decade -- to China's development.
sent.trans: 所以，对于我们的建设事业说来，八十年代是很重要的，是决定性的。

sent.orig: Annual observations are insufficient for estimating variability decade by decade.
sent.trans: 年度的观察是不足以十年十年的估算变异性的。

sent.orig: This is a fruitful decade and a decade of your devotion without any complaint.
sent.trans: 这是富有成果的十年，也是各位默默奉献的十年。

sent.orig: Decade of and rain, full of talents and strive decade have made fruitful achievements.
sent.trans: 十年风雨，人才辈出，十年奋斗，硕果累累。
